name: MaxSoft
tagline: MaxSoft - software solutions for your business
description:
MaxSoft is young but dynamic fast growing software company dedicated to quality and precision in managing the ideas and needs of our clients. We are a team of software professionals with long experience in the field of information technologies. Our developers and consultants are certified specialists and have experience in managing, development and integration of small and large scale projects.
 We are motivated to accelerate your growth, to help you straighten your positions in the market by bringing quality and complete solutions and services.
 The mission is to be strategic partners with our clients by fitting the needs and requirements of their projects and by that accomplishing overall customer satisfaction.
